source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4GUIDE2_00555_CULINARIAN00519_000_000<tab>It's hardly a surprise with all this watery aether, but the air here is so full of moisture. <sigh> I suppose now I'll need to keep an eye out for mold. Keeping food fresh was never an issue in the colder regions...
target:
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4GUIDE2_00555_CULINARIAN00519_000_000水属性の力が強いせいか、この一帯は湿気が多い……。
寒冷地だった前のピューロス帯と違って、
食品の保存には注意が必要だな。

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4GUIDE2_00555_CULINARIAN00519_000_010<tab>Sealed away the primal, did they? Good for them. Scholars and heroes perform great deeds, but my place is here at the pot. Filling empty bellies with nourishing dishes is an epic undertaking all of its own in an environment such as this...
target:
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4GUIDE2_00555_CULINARIAN00519_000_010蛮神を封印したと聞いたが、俺の仕事は変わらない。
日々の活力となる食事を、いかに美味しく提供できるか。
ただそれだけだ。

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4GUIDE2_00555_CULINARIAN00519_000_020<tab>So, that's the end of the expedition, is it? Maybe I can invent a new flavor of stew to celebrate the occasion!
target:
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4GUIDE2_00555_CULINARIAN00519_000_020調査の完全終了か……。
細々とした仕事はまだ残っているだろうが、
一区切りとするためにも、特別な料理を考えた方がよさそうだ。

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4GUIDE2_00555_CULINARIAN00519_000_030<tab>The expedition draws to a close, but the mood in the camp is grim. Maybe a light and tasty dish will aid in lifting this oppressive pall...
target:
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4GUIDE2_00555_CULINARIAN00519_000_030……調査が一段落したそうだが、それにしては空気が重い。
ここは皆の気分を変えられるよう、
なにか特別な献立を考えた方がよさそうだ。

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4GUIDE2_00555_CULINARIAN00519_000_040<tab>Whatever happened within that tower, all I know is that it signals the end of the expedition. The time has come to prepare my most sumptuous creation, and restore the bodies of our weary explorers!
target:
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4GUIDE2_00555_CULINARIAN00519_000_040何やら本部塔の方でいろいろとあった様子だが、
俺にとって重要なのは、調査が完全終了したということだけ。
ここはとっておきの美味いもので、皆の苦労をねぎらうとしよう。
